Tolkien-related events that took place in 1867.

content.title: August
content.content: 13 - Sir William Craigie, Tolkien's predecessor as Rawlinson and Bosworth Professor of Anglo-Saxon, is born.

? - George MacDonald's short story "The Golden Key", for which J.R.R. Tolkien would later prepare an introduction, is published.
